Class BezierCurve3D

  • java.lang.Object

    public final class BezierCurve3D
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A cubic Bézier curve in 3D space.
    See Also:
    Wikipedia on Bézier Curves, Serialized Form
